name: Extract Header Data
overview: Move your mouse over the image to the left to zoom in and see the details up close.

questions.text:
What is the receipt identifier? It is usually at the top and should be in the format of L####-###, where L is a letter and the #s are almost always **NUMBERS**, and there's a hyphen (not underscore) between them. Note, always capitalize the first letter, even if it's not capitalized when written.

Guess if you can, or just put in the first letter if you can't. (The first letter is from the name of the store). If it's not visible at all, put in A0 (the letter A, followed by a zero)
questions.title: First letter must be capitalized, the next character must be a number
questions.smsText:
What is the receipt identifier? It is usually at the top and should be in the format of L####-###, where L is a letter and the #s are almost always **NUMBERS**, and there's a hyphen (not underscore) between them. Note, always capitalize the first letter, even if it's not capitalized when written.

Guess if you can, or just put in the first letter if you can't. (The first letter is from the name of the store). If it's not visible at all, put in A0 (the letter A, followed by a zero)
What time was this receipt? (1=Before 10:30AM,2=10:30AM - 2PM,3=2PM-5:30PM,4=After 5:30PM,5=Receipt does not say / not sure)

choices.text: Receipt does not say / not sure

questions.text: Is there a *value meal* or combo meal (a discount for buying things together, like fries and a drink with a burger) on the receipt?
questions.smsText: Is there a *value meal* or combo meal (a discount for buying things together, like fries and a drink with a burger) on the receipt? (1=Yes,2=No,3=Not sure)

questions.text: Including Tax, what was the total amount on this receipt?  (Do not include the $ in your answer).  Put in "0" (zero) if the total is illegible.
questions.smsText: Including Tax, what was the total amount on this receipt?  (Do not include the $ in your answer).  Put in "0" (zero) if the total is illegible.

questions.text: Did you have any issues with this task?
questions.smsText: Did you have any issues with this task? (1=No issues,2=Illegible -- some or all of the data was too hard to read, even with the zoom tool,3=The image didn't load,4=Other)

choices.text: Illegible -- some or all of the data was too hard to read, even with the zoom tool
